title: Himi 270
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
Ko e me’a mālie fau,
Kia kitautolu,
‘A e hoko mai ‘a Sīsū
Ko hotau kāinga.
2.
Pea ne fai, ‘o lava’i,
‘A hotau huhu’i;
Pea kuo tau hao ai,
Ke tau kumi lelei.
3.
Ko e me’a ‘ia Sīsū,
‘Oku faingofua,
‘Oku tau hoko ‘o lotu,
Ki hotau ‘Otua.
4.
‘Oku tau kole, pea ma’u,
Kumi, pea ‘ilo,
Tau tuki ki he matapā
Pea to’o leva.
5.
Ko e noa, mo e tuli,
Pea mo e kui;
Mo e kau kilia kovi
Fakalaumālie.
6.
Mo e ve’ekovi foki,
Pea mo e mate,
Ke nau tui kia Sīsū,
Ke nau mo’ui ai. *
